translation.System_001: Welcome to Vereal Village! It is great to have you here!
translation.System_002: Press space bar to interact, read, talk.
translation.System_004: Take your time to explore the neighborhood, take a walk and enjoy the town!
translation.System_005: You might find some interesting activity and meet new people!
translation.Mario_001: [i]It doesn't look that bad here. Let's see what's around.[/i]
translation.Town_hall_party:
[b]Town Hall
Dancing party, this Friday night at the Municipal Hall. 
Entry hours: 8:00PM - 11:00PM
Free entrance[/b]
translation.Mario_party: [i]Oh well. Not a fan of dancing, but at least it is a good occasion to meet someone. I'd better go get prepared and dress nicely.[/i]
translation.Dog_pound_sign:
[b]Dog shelter
Come meet your new best friend.[/b]
translation.Mario_dog: [i]I always wanted a dog. But I don't think I can take such a responsibility on my own. Maybe one day I'll be able to share this joy with someone else.[/i]
translation.Inn:
[b]AvaBar
Grog, Nuka Coke, Pißwater and much more!
Come in, we're open![/b]
translation.Mario_Inn: [i]Seems cool. I should get here sometime. But I don't feel like drinking alone at the moment.[/i]
translation.Mario_restaurant: [i]Seems like a nice place. But I'm not a fan of sitting alone at a table.[/i]
translation.Mario_park: [i]What a lovely garden. I wish I had something similar at my place. [/i]
translation.Mario_house: [i]Damn! This looks exactly like my dream home! I would give anything to live here![/i]
translation.Mario_party_1: [i]I should go get prepared before it is too late...[/i]
translation.Mario_party_2: [i]Let's hope they have a bar. Sometimes chatting with the barman is the only way to survive a dancing night.[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_restaurant: [i]Nope. It seems that the party is not here.[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_bar: [i]Maybe for the afterparty? If it is still open.[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_house: [i]I know I'm not the most outgoing person, but let's make a little effort. I got here to try to socialize, after all...[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_000: [i]I should be going. The party won't wait for me forever...[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_002: [i]I feel so misplaced. What was I thinking? I hate dancing nights, why did I think this event could be any different from the others?[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_003: [i]I'll just stand aside for a while. Just for few minutes. Just to see what kind of people are around.[/i]
translation.Gioia_partynight_001: Hey! You're new around here, aren't you? I am Mael, nice to meet you!
translation.Mario_partynight_004: Uhm, yeah, I mean, sure. I am new.
translation.Gioia_partynight_002: Hello, New, nice to meet you! When did you arrive?
translation.Mario_partynight_005: No, ehr, I mean, I am not new. I mean, yes I am. Well, my name is Ariom. I already did a mess, didn't I? I am not used to these kinds of interactions. To these places. I mean, it is my first time. I got here recently.
translation.Gioia_partynight_003: Hey, it's great! I should show you around! There's tons of nice things to do, and places to visit, and people to meet!
translation.Gioia_partynight_004: Enough with your worries! Leave your life outside this ballroom and enjoy the night!
translation.Mario_partynight_006: [i]This place cannot be real. Not even in a billion years I could have any chance to be approached by someone like her. Is this really happening?[/i]
translation.Gioia_partynight_005: Hey guys, this is New! I mean, he's Ariom, he just arrived. Let's welcome him!
translation.Mario_partynight_007: [i]Am I really enjoying this place? This event? Could this finally be the place I was looking for?[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_008: [i]I don't know. And what about her?[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_009: [i]I don't even know her, but the things she says, the way she approached me...[/i]
translation.Mario_partynight_010: [i]I think I'll stay around a little longer...[/i]
translation.Gioia_partynight_007: Hey... What a night... Did you enjoy it? I hope you had fun...
translation.Gioia_partynight_008: It was nice to meet you... Will you stay around? We could meet again somewhere...
translation.Mario_partynight_011: Sure, why not. It was nice. I wasn't sure I was going to stay, but why not. Looks like a nice place, and I bet you can helping getting to know it.
translation.Gioia_partynight_009: It's late. I should go. Back to good ol' life, tomorrow. You'd better go as well, don't you have anything to do tomorrow morning?
translation.Mario_partynight_012: You're right. Until the next time, then. I'll see you around... 'Night!
translation.Town_hall_postparty:
[b]Town Hall
Charity lottery every Sunday - Inquire inside[/b]
translation.Mario_first_date001: [i]Well, let's see who's around today... Time for a walk![/i]
translation.Mario_first_date002: [i]I wonder if she's still around. Maybe she's not even regular around here... [/i]
translation.Mario_first_date003: [i]Maybe she just came for yesterday's party.[/i]
translation.Mario_first_date004: [i]I'd really want to see if I can find her...[/i]
translation.Mario_first_date005: Oh, there you are! I was not sure to find you!
translation.Gioia_first_date001: Hey, it's good to see you! So you're still around! This is my place, do you like it?
translation.Gioia_first_date002: Do you also have a place nearby?
translation.Mario_first_date006: Yeah, I got a small house next to the woods, north west from the center of the town.
translation.Gioia_first_date003: Nice! I'd like to see it!
translation.Mario_first_date007: Oh well, it's nothing special, I'm still working on it, it's very basic for the moment...
translation.Gioia_first_date004: Oh, come on, I'm sure it's nice!
translation.Mario_first_date008: Ok, if you insist... I'll show you my place.
translation.Gioia_first_date005: So, how do you like it so far?
translation.Mario_first_date009: It's not bad, it is a nice place to get detached from a busy life, don't you think?
translation.Gioia_first_date006:
Yes, I agree. I've been around for a while, people are nice here. Not the type of people obsessed by social networks, if you know what I mean.
They get here for a twist to their life, they go out, they see people, they hang out together... Isn't it better?
translation.Mario_first_date010: Sure, I guess... I also needed a break from those stupid social networks. I needed something different, get closer to people, you know...
translation.Gioia_first_date007: Isn't it what we all need?
translation.Mario_first_date011: So here we are. This is my humble house. Yeah, don't laugh, I wish I could find something better, instead I had to go for these terrible roof tiles...
translation.Gioia_first_date008: No way! I like that color! It's one of my favorites! I like it! Are you here all by yourself?
translation.Mario_first_date012: Yeah. You know... Rough period... That''s why I decided to get here.
translation.Gioia_first_date009: Oh, I am sorry to hear... I am sure you'll like it here, you'll see!
translation.Mario_first_date013: Yeah, I was wondering... You've been here for a while, isn't it? Maybe you can suggest me so-
translation.Gioia_first_date010: Sure! Of course! Listen, I have to go for a while, why don't we meet later at the bar? It has a nice vibe, the music is amazing and you can tell me something more about you... I'll be back in... let's say... A couple of hours? Deal?
translation.Mario_first_date014: S-sure, I'll wait for you. I'll take care of a couple of things in the house and I'll be at the bar waiting for you. I'll be the one... well, dressed like I am now!
translation.Gioia_first_date011: Haha, you're funny, you know? See ya!
translation.Mario_first_date016: [i]OK. Its going to be fine. What can go wrong? It's just some chat.  [/i]
translation.Mario_first_date017: [i]And now I don't feel like working at the house. I'll read a book to kill some time.[/i]
translation.Gioia_bar001: Well, I think I'll get a beer, and you?
translation.Gioia_bar002: OK, then, we'll toast to your arrival!
translation.Gioia_bar003: And so, what brought you here?
translation.Gioia_bar004: No wait, I'll start, so you will feel comfortable opening up.
translation.Gioia_bar005: I first came here a couple of years ago.
translation.Gioia_bar006: I was abroad for a year for a project and when I got back home I was no longer feeling in the right place.
translation.Gioia_bar007: I was less and less seeing my friends, many things changed in one year...
translation.Gioia_bar008: Some of them got married, some got kids, others left the country...
translation.Gioia_bar009: The first time I got here I was feeling terribly alone. Then I kept coming during the weekends and I could breath some fresh air here...
translation.Gioia_bar010: I needed a new place for a brand new start. And so I decided that this was the right place where to spend my time.
translation.Gioia_bar011: From time to time I still go visiting the old places where I went with my friends, but that's my previous life.
translation.Gioia_bar012: Here I like it better. I don't have to deal with all of those things which remind me of a good time when I still had my friends and activities.
translation.Mario_bar003: Oh, your story is quite interesting. I think I can relate.
translation.Mario_bar004A: ...willing to spend some time by myself.
translation.Mario_bar004B: ...trying to start a new life from scratch.
translation.Mario_bar004A1: I was starting to loose control over my life. Too many things to do, too many things to take care of, too many events, too many requests. I just needed a break.
translation.Mario_bar004B1: I was not satisfied with my life. I thought it was time to reboot everything and start doing what I really like.
translation.Mario_bar004C1: I have tried pretty much everything in my life, and nothing was enough. I was getting bored. This sounded like something completely new I never tried before, so I wanted to give it a try.
translation.Gioia_bar014: Well, Ariom, I am sure you are in the right place. And what are your interests?
translation.Mario_bar005C: I like writing short stories and novels.
translation.Mario_bar005A1: It intrigues me being able to peek into other creatures' lives, study their behavior, and being able to do all of this while being completely alone.
translation.Mario_bar005B1: They allow you to entertain yourself even if you are alone. And if you play with other people you can pretend you are no longer alone, even if you are not physically close.
translation.Mario_bar005C1: I like the idea of being the one deciding for the lives and events of other creatures.
translation.Gioia_bar005A1: Oh really?! I watch tons of documentaries about birds! I even started biology classes but then I coudn't finish my studies... I should suggest you some great movie!
translation.Gioia_bar005A2: No way! I'm a geek too! We should setup a challenge one of these days! I am a fan of RPGs and shooters! No one can beat me! But I am terrible at rhythm games!
translation.Gioia_bar005A3: That is SO interesting! I used to write a lot but lately I haven't had enough time... Would you show me some of your works? I am so curious! Maybe I can share with you a blog I was keeping some time ago...
translation.Mario_bar006: Oh great! What were the chances? Sure, I'd love to! And now you would really surprise me if you told me you were also fan of...
translation.Gioia_bar0060: Oh come on! You have been spying on me! This cannot be real!
translation.Gioia_bar006A1: I have a huge collection of Mongolian throat singings and Ainu traditional songs! And Bulgarian choirs? Don't you like them?
translation.Gioia_bar006A2: I collect tiny pieces of furniture and I use them as photographic sets for praying mantis and other insects! And I recreate movies' sets!
translation.Gioia_bar006A3: I started collecting shells when I was 5! I have a pebble from the mount Fuji, star-shaped grains of sand from Okinawa, black stones from Iceland...
translation.Mario_bar007: OK, OK, slow down. Now this is getting weird. I think I need another glass. We are going to have a long discussion ahead!
translation.Mario_bar008: ...and that's when the quokka threw at me one of his babies, which are called joeys, to flee for her life...
translation.Mario_bar009: Oh my god it is so late! I kept you up all night! Does this bar ever close?
translation.Gioia_bar014.1: Not that I know of... Every time I pass by it is open. Damn, you did so many things in your life! I want to know more, you're so interesting! Why don't we go out for dinner next time?
translation.Mario_bar010: Hey, you sure don't have time to loose... Sure, whenever you want.
translation.Gioia_bar015: Great. There's a nice restaurant not far from my place.
translation.Gioia_bar015.1: I won't be around in the next couple of days. Show up to my place in three days, around 6PM and I'll walk you there.
translation.Gioia_bar016: If you cannot find me just wait for me. I'll eventually show up.
translation.Mario_bar011: Deal. I'll be there. What about the food?
translation.Gioia_bar017: I think I will have some Dim sum, but if you are not a fan of Asian food feel free to have whatever you want, you don't have to eat what I'll eat!
translation.Gioia_bar018: It is super late, I gotta go, cheers!
translation.Mario_bar013: [i]Oh well. Who could imagine we had so many things to talk about? And now these two days will be the longest ever. I should find something to do.[/i]
translation.Mario_bar014: [i]And by the way. What the hell does she have to do? Far from here for two days? Curiosity killed the cat, and it will kill me as well...[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner001: [i]Damn, it felt like this day was never arriving. I've been scouting every inch of this village and nothing looks as interesting as Mael.[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner002: [i]I've been watching people passing by, but I can only think about her.[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner003: [i]They said that "Before Sunrise" was just a movie. What if it is not? What if it can also happen to anyone? To me?[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner004: [i]And what if she doesn't show up?[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner005: [i]And what if we don't have anything else to talk about?[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner006: [i]And what if she makes noises while chewing?[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner007: [i]No. I'm not going. Better not knowing than actually going and discover that it was nothing but an illusion.[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner008: [i]I won't show up. But then she'll look for me. She knows where I am staying.[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner009: [i]No, I cannot behave like this. She'll think I didn't like her. Or worse. She'll think she offended me.[/i]
translation.Mario_dinner010: [i]OK, I have to go. If things turn out to go wrong, I'll just find a way to step away. I'll make up an excuse. [/i]
translation.Mario_far: [i]Have I forgotten where her place is?[/i]
translation.Mario_delay1: [i]I don't want her to be waiting for me. [/i]
translation.Mario_dinner011.1: [i]I knew that. She won't come. I shouldn't have come.[/i]
translation.Gioia_dinner001: Why hello! I though you had forgotten! I'll be right there, it's almost dinner time!
translation.Gioia_dinner002: Have you decided what you will eat?
translation.Mario_dinner012: Yeah, lately I have been craving for some risotto. Tonight will be the night.
translation.Gioia_dinner003: Great choice! I am ready, let's move!
translation.Gioia_dinner004: Mmm this Dim sum is delicious. It's been a while since the last time I got one. How is your risotto?
translation.Mario_dinner012.1: Not bad at all. I had tasted better, but I cannot complain. Do you want to try?
translation.Gioia_dinner005: Haha. No thanks, I think I'll pass. But thanks for asking...
translation.Gioia_dinner006: Nah, I got here a couple of time when I started getting around here, but then I didn't have anyone to go with.
translation.Gioia_dinner007: But they do sometimes host quiz evenings here, if I am not wrong you like those kind of events, I'll let you know if they organize something similar, we can team up and participate together!
translation.Mario_dinner014: It would be great. Did I tell you about that time I won a katana participating in a quiz about cartoon themes?
translation.Gioia_dinner008: Oh no, not again! Don't tell me you're one of those weirdos know-it-all about music quizzes! I am so going to challenge you! And I won't take a no for an answer!
translation.Mario_dinner015: You're asking for it! You'll so regret it!
translation.Gioia_dinner009: Oh, wait a second, my phone, I have to take this one.
translation.Gioia_dinner010: I am so sorry, it was the boss. He needs me to take care about something urgent. Anyway, I was done with my Dim sum, are you done as well with your risotto?
translation.Mario_dinner016: Yeah, no worries. I also remembered I had to take care of something, we can catch up next time, no offense taken.
translation.Gioia_dinner011: Hey, I mean it! You know what? Let's do it tomorrow. Keen for a walk after dinner?
translation.Mario_dinner017: What about daytime? Do you really want to have me waiting for the whole day?
translation.Gioia_dinner012: Well, you know, I have things to do... you must have as well, don't you?
translation.Mario_dinner018: Sure, plenty of. No worries. You know what? Meet me in the main square, around 9PM.
translation.Mario_dinner020: [i]And once again. She disappears. She's going to drive me crazy. Oh how I love this. [/i]
translation.Mario_dinner021: [i]But this time I'll be the one driving her crazy. [/i]
translation.Mario_dinner022: [i]I have the whole day to set this up. She'll be speechless.[/i]
translation.Gioia_night003: Because it's pitch dark at night!
translation.Mario_night008: So what? What can they do to us? There is no one around. And even if there were, if it's that dark no one will see us!
translation.Mario_night009: Come on. Let yourself go. I have everything set up. Trust me.
translation.Mario_night010: Now grab me and don't let go. Close your eyes and don't sneak peek. I'll tell you when to open your eyes.
translation.Gioia_night007: It feels so close... It reminds me of an old Italian song...
translation.Gioia_night009: ♪ "When we share this world we love in..." ♪
translation.Mario_night015: ♪ "It's such a world apart, this dreamy world we love in..." ♪
translation.Gioia_night010: No one ever did something similar for me...
translation.Gioia_night011: I wish this night would never end.
translation.Mario_night016: Why do we have to go back to our duties? Can't we just stay here forever?
translation.Mario_whatweare001: [i]And good morning to me. Damn, I've wasted almost the whole day. Not like I've been getting much sleep, lately. [/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare002: [i]OK, it looks obvious that if I wasn't sure whether to stay or not, I now have my answer.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare003: [i]Tonight I felt more alive than I ever felt in the last year. [/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare004: [i]I am sure she feels the same way as well.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare005: [i]And I am so dumb I didn't even tell her.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare006: [i]I'll make my move. It is my chance. [/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare007: [i]I should really go and find her.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare009: [i]She must be home. I hope she'll be happy to see me first thing in the morn... ehm... afternoon...[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare_townhall: [i]I don't have time to waste here. I've got better things to do.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare_bar: [i]Not the right moment to get a drink.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare_restaurant: [i]I'm not hungry now, my stomach's filled with butterflies![/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare_dogpound: [i]Yeah, we'll also get a dog, and plenty of cats. And a bunch of rabbits. But not now![/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare010: Hey! Mael! Are you there? Wake up!
translation.Mario_whatweare012: I looks like she's not here. Where can she be?
translation.Mario_whatweare015: Hello, do you know Mael? Have you seen her around?
translation.Mario_whatweare016: Hey, sorry, do you know Mael? Have you seen her today?
translation.Mario_whatweare017: Uh, excuse me, have you seen Mael around? Cute girl, red hair...
translation.Randomguy3: Uh, sure, Mael. She was around this morning, very early. She said she was late and she left in a hurry. She needed to take care of something...
translation.Mario_whatweare019: [i]I'm such a stupid, I didn't even ask for her phone number! I'll have to wait until she gets back![/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare020: [i]Better wait in front of her house.[/i]
translation.Mario_whatweare021: [i]OK. I have time. I'll read a book in the meantime...[/i]
translation.Gioia_whatweare001: Hello! What are you doing here?
translation.Mario_whatweare022: Hey. I was waiting for you. You were nowhere to be found! Where were you?
translation.Gioia_whatweare002: Hey! Don't you ever leave this place? I was just taking care of personal stuff. Everybody does that!
translation.Mario_whatweare023: Sure. That's what I am doing as well. I am here to take care of something I care about.
translation.Gioia_whatweare003: I-I'm not sure I am following.
translation.Mario_whatweare024: Come with me. Let's take a walk. Would you mind?
translation.Mario_whatweare030A: The last couple of days with you meant to me more than I could imagine.
translation.Mario_whatweare030B: I thought it was a crazy idea to get here, but you helped me make up my mind.
translation.Mario_whatweare030C: It can't be a coincidence we met here and we found out we have so many things in common.
translation.Mario_whatweare030A1: It drives me mad thinking that you might just disappear into thin air and realize I missed my chance.
translation.Mario_whatweare030B1: If there is one reason why I want to stay here, that reason is you.
translation.Mario_whatweare030C1: And if it is just a coincidence, I want to make sure I am doing whatever it takes to be sure it becomes something else.
translation.Mario_whatweare031: It is like the world that surrounds me has brighter colors when I am here with you.
translation.Mario_whatweare032houseforsale: You see this house? You can think I am mad, but I started daydreaming about being here with you. I remember how much you like BBQs and sunbathing in the park, wouldn't it be amazing? The roof tiles even come in your favorite color!
translation.Mario_whatweare033dogpound: I even thought about how it would be to come here and get a pup, just for the two of us... Wouldn't it be great? You told me you always wanted one but you could never afford to adopt one...
translation.Mario_whatweare034woods: We could spend our afternoons strolling in the woods enjoying the atmosphere before going to our favorite bar for a drink. Wouldn't you love it?
translation.Mario_whatweare35centralsquare: Every time I pass by the town hall I think about our first night and how you made me feel. I am even willing to learn to dance for you!
translation.Mario_whatweare36centralpark: Watching the stars all by myself will no longer make sense if it is not next to you...
translation.Gioia_whatweare004: Hey, I understand you, I do. And would be lying if I said it was not the same for me...
translation.Gioia_whatweare005: I do want to spend more time with you. But you see, it is not that easy. We both have our lives, our things to do, it is not just like "hey hello, why don't we just stick together every available second", you know?
translation.Mario_whatweare37: It is not a contract, we can just try. And if it does not work we can just part our ways. But if we don't try we will never find out if we had a chance.
translation.Mario_whatweare38: Think of it as a challenge...
translation.Gioia_whatweare006: And what if it does not work?
translation.Gioia_whatweare007: You sure know how to persuade people...
translation.Mario_anniversary001: Woah, look at that! I was not expecting snow at this time of the year!
translation.Gioia_anniversary001: No, I am fine, thanks. What about you?
translation.Mario_anniversary003: All good on my side. Anyway it is just an impression. You see the snow, you think it is cold. Just don't focus on it...
translation.Gioia_anniversary002: Yeah, I always keep forgetting that perceptions can be altered with some mind effort...
translation.Gioia_anniversary003: Could you believe? This time last year it was early spring and we could spend the night in the park watching the stars...
translation.Mario_anniversary003.1: Yeah, crazy times. Someone must be messing up with the seasons... Hey, up there! Enough with this snow, alright?
translation.Gioia_anniversary004: Hey, no one is going to listen to you!
translation.Gioia_anniversary005: Yeah, I was in such a rush, you kept me up until late yesterday... I am still sleepy!
translation.Mario_anniversary005A: Hey, you cannot simply interrupt a movie while watching!
translation.Mario_anniversary005B: Hey, you cannot simply interrupt a board game while playing!
translation.Mario_anniversary005C: Hey, you cannot simply leave a concert before it ends!
translation.Gioia_anniversary005A: I know! But I am going to work this morning! And anyway, the movie was so bad I was almost falling asleep!
translation.Gioia_anniversary005B: I know! But maybe next time we could play something shorter, since I work in the morning!
translation.Gioia_anniversary005C: I know! But it was not even my genre! Next time I'll be the one deciding which concert to attend!
translation.Gioia_anniversary006: I'll have to go, or I'll get fired. See you tonight.
translation.Mario_anniversary006: Sure. I'll go get a proper breakfast. Don't forget about tonight, don't be late as usual!
translation.Gioia_anniversary007: I would never miss it! And you, don't slack around the whole day!
translation.Mario_anniversary009: [i]I am so blessed she decided to try this crazy adventure.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary010: [i]We had some ups and downs, but we adapted kinda soon. We managed to find our rhythm and schedules. [/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary011: [i]It still drives me crazy not knowing what she does all day long. [/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary012: [i]But her privacy is the only thing she asked me not to be nosy about.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary013: [i]I think I owe her. I just showed up from nowhere, got into her life and asked her to change her plans and her habits.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary014: [i]She has her life. I am OK with that.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary015: [i]And it is not like she's constantly checking what I am doing when I am not with her. I also have my life. Speaking of which. I should set things up for tonight. [/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary016: [i]I'd better iron my fancy suit, and shave, and go get some flowers... Let's hope I'll have enough time until dinner![/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary017: [i]All nice and clean! Time to pick up my darling![/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary019: [i]I will never get used to seeing snow around... It look so weird! [/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary020: [i]Especially since I don't feel cold at all![/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary021: Hooooneeeeyyy!!! Are you late as always?
translation.Gioia_anniversary007.1: No, I am here! Just wait a minute, I am almost ready!
translation.Mario_anniversary023: Come on, it's late! I'll wait for you at our table, before someone else will steal it!
translation.Gioia_anniversary008: OK! Sorry, I'll be there soonish! Don't start eating before I get there!
translation.Mario_anniversary024_bar: [i]This is not the restaurant... We might get here later...[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary025: [i]I should go and get the table before it is too late.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary026: [i]I am starving. She'd better hurry up.[/i]
translation.Mario_anniversary027: [i]Why the hell is she taking so long?[/i]
translation.Gioia_anniversary009: Hello sweetheart, sorry for being late, are you eating already? Sorry, I just found out my microwave was not working, I had to call a technician. He'll come tomorrow.
translation.Mario_anniversary028: Hey, it is OK. Do you want me to be with you when he'll come tomorrow? To make sure he won't try to fool you?
translation.Gioia_anniversary010: Oh no, thanks, I will be fine. Hey, it's late already, why don't we eat?
translation.Mario_anniversary029: Sure. I am going to enjoy some deliciously homemade sushi tonight! What about you?
translation.Gioia_anniversary011: Wow, that's tempting! But I've been wanting to get some pizza, lately, I will get sushi another day. Let me know if it good as I think it is!
translation.Gioia_anniversary014: OK. Here I go. Well. It has been an intense year. I would have never believed we could make our relationship work.
translation.Mario_anniversary032: No one would have ever believed that!
translation.Gioia_anniversary016: It took us a lot of adjustment, and reciprocal trust.
translation.Gioia_anniversary017: I am not entirely sure we can be considered totally sane about this...
translation.Mario_anniversary035: Come on, just because I asked you out on our second day?
translation.Gioia_anniversary018: Or maybe because you didn't know anything about me?
translation.Mario_anniversary036: Not that I know much more now after a year...
translation.Gioia_anniversary019: Well, for a start you know me more than anyone else around this village!
translation.Mario_anniversary037: That's true, I have to admit... But I don't think it is enough.
translation.Mario_anniversary038: I don't want to share you with your colleagues or friends when you are not around me.
translation.Gioia_anniversary021: Come on, don't make it difficult. We've been already talking about this...
translation.Mario_anniversary039: I know, I know, I don't want to suffocate you... but I was thinking... I would feel safer to know you are bound to me... More like... you know, committed...
translation.Mario_anniversary040: Nothing, really... It's just a formality...
translation.Mario_anniversary041: Never mind. We were celebrating. Let's toast! I'll pour some champagne.
translation.Mario_anniversary042: To our first incredible unexpected against-all-odds year...
translation.Mario_anniversary044: Oh gosh, this is so sparkling!!!
translation.Gioia_anniversary027: Hahaha what were you expecting! It is not cider!
translation.Mario_anniversary046: I should remember not to get natto, next time!
translation.Mario_marry003: Come on, you knew I would have reached this point eventually... What's the purpose of me staying at my place, you staying at your place...
translation.Mario_marry004: It's exactly the same, but I'll get to see you while you're doing your things when you're not outside...
translation.Gioia_marry003: I guess I am just afraid of committing. I came here for the freedom, to be completely myself far from everything and everyone...
translation.Mario_marry005: It will be fun! You were afraid one year ago, and it is OK to be afraid! But think of all the things we could do! We could be even closer! Cooking together, waking up in the same bed, I'd get to see you while you play videogames and you get mad at the screen...
translation.Gioia_marry004: We can already do those things...
translation.Mario_marry006: That's true, but we always have to arrange the meeting, set a schedule, my place or yours...
translation.Mario_marry007: I'd be able to see you as soon as you get home instead of having to come and pick you up, to ask if you are home, if you are available, if you have plans or not...
translation.Gioia_marry005: I have the feeling this won't do any good to us. We both came here to be independent...
translation.Mario_marry008: But we found each other. We know we're made for one other.
translation.Mario_marry010: I will do my best to convince you. Trust me.
translation.Gioia_marry007: You always manage to persuade me...
translation.Mario_marry011: I always get what I want!
translation.Gioia_marry007.1: I am exhausted. I need some good sleep. It's been a tough day, and this dinner has been intense. I need some proper rest. Thanks for the company, I enjoyed the evening. I'd better go now.
translation.Mario_marry012: Hey. We made it till now. We can take this further, if we both want it...
translation.Mario_marry013: I'll be in the park tomorrow afternoon. Will you meet me there?
translation.Gioia_marry008: Yeah. Not before 6PM. I won't make it home before that time.
translation.Mario_moving001: [i]Damn, I drank myself to sleep last night. I never proposed before in my whole life. I was not expecting such a weird reaction.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving002: [i]I will surprise her so much she won't be able to refuse me.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_bar: [i]Mhmm thanks but no thanks. If I only see a bottle I'll feel like puking...[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_restaurant: [i]What do I do here? I cannot just invite her again for dinner. That would be boring AF.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_townhall: [i]Sure. I could book a slot for our wedding. Ha-ha. No way.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_gioiahouse: [i]I'm not going to call her unless I know what to do.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_park: [i]I told her to meet me in the park, but not that early. I'll be bored to death by the time she'll meet me![/i]
translation.Mario_moving_dogpound: [i]I am so sure she'd be the happiest person here if I brought her a dog, but I don't want to put all the responsibility on her shoulders, not until we can both share it.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving_houseforsale: [i]This is exactly what I need. She's been dreaming of this since a long time. She won't be able to refuse me![/i]
translation.Mario_moving_houseforsale1: [i]Let's see if there is any useful information on the sign[/i]
translation.Mario_moving004: [i]OK. There's a QR code. I need to fill in the form and then he'll contact me. Let's get this thing done![/i]
translation.Mario_moving005: [i]And now let's wait. I'll go get a shower.[/i]
translation.System_20: The house is available. If interested, please send a deposit to this prepaid account prior to filling in the attached documents: verealestate@payple.com
translation.Mario_moving007: [i]And now let's spend some of the money I've been earning with all those silly online activities and have been sitting there forever...[/i]
translation.Mario_moving009: [i]Oh damn, it's late. I should be going to the park, or this time I'll be the late one.[/i]
translation.Mario_moving010: Oh, hey! You're here already! How surprising!
translation.Gioia_moving001: Hey, yeah, I got home earlier today and I had some spare time. I wanted to discuss about yesterday...
translation.Mario_moving012: OK, OK, we'll discuss about that later, in front of a beer, what do you think? I have something to show you, first!
translation.Gioia_moving003: OK, what is that? You sound so excited!
translation.Mario_moving013: I am! You won't believe your eyes! Follow me!
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_bar: I didn't arrange everything just to sit at the bar!
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_restaurant: There's no time for this! We can celebrate later!
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_dogpound: Seriously? Am I starting being obsessed by dogs?
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_townhall: Tik tok, tik tok, the time is running!
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_mariohouse: There's a nicer house than this one waiting for me! Or for us!
translation.Mario_gioia_moving_gioiahouse: Sure, she just got home, she must be so willing to go back home again!
translation.Gioia_moving004: What should I think? The same thing I always thought! That this house is amazing and that I would kill for a garden like this!
translation.Mario_moving015: Oh well, no need to kill anyone! But you can thank me, if you want.
translation.Gioia_moving005: Thank you? And why is that?
translation.Mario_moving016: Because I got it! For us! Just say yes!
translation.Gioia_moving007: Come on, why would you do something so stupid! It was so effing expensive!
translation.Mario_moving018: I've been saving a lot this year! You deserved this! And we deserve to be happy!
translation.Mario_moving019: We could feel like a real couple, finally!
translation.Mario_moving020: And the rooftop is your favorite color!
translation.Gioia_moving008: And the rooftop is my favorite color. Damn, I can't believe it.
translation.Mario_moving021: So? Is this a yes? I am so excited! We can move in in a blink of an eye!
translation.Gioia_moving006.1: Oh my god, am I really doing this? Are we? Oh gosh, I can't wait to see how it looks like on the inside! Can I enter? Can I?
translation.Mario_moving023: I guess this is a yes...
translation.Gioia_moving011: YES! YESSS!!! WHEN DO WE MOVE IN?
translation.Mario_moving025: Easy, easy girl! There is no rush. This place is ours and no one will steal it from us.
translation.Gioia_dog001: ...And so I was thinking to invite Maya as well, she helped me creating that beautiful dress you saw last week end.
translation.Gioia_dog002: And Julia, of course. She's the one giving those yoga lessons I sometimes attend.
translation.Gioia_dog003: Should we call Greg? He suggested us where to get these beautiful flowers, we should definitely invite him.
translation.Mario_dog002a: And we should bring some of those crates we have in the basement or we won't have enough seats for the guests...
translation.Mario_dog002b: And what about a gazebo for a nice touch?
translation.Mario_dog002c: And we should go big and get one of those Japanese gates, I am sure we can rent one!
translation.Gioia_dog002a: Uhm, a bit rural, but it can work...
translation.Gioia_dog_002b: Sure, one of those beautiful white arches they have in the park!
translation.Gioia_dog002c: Oh yeah, that would make the best party ever!
translation.Gioia_dog004: We should share the invitation in the village group chat, I don't want anyone to feel excluded.
translation.Mario_dog003: Good idea. They'd easily find out we had a party here. Better not to exclude anyone.
translation.Gioia_dog005: Hey, I am sorry hun, I almost forgot, I had to take care of something I just can't postpone, can you deal with the rest of the invitations?
translation.Mario_dog004: Come on, not today! You said you didn't have any plan! What is it now? Where do you have to go?
translation.Gioia_dog006: The deal was clear, I want to keep separated what we are having here and what I do when I am not here. You promised.
translation.Mario_dog005: OK, OK. Got it. There's always something you need to do.
translation.Gioia_dog007: Come on, hun, you know I do it for us. I don't want to bring here my worries and my concerns about my work or, like in this case, about my family. This is our happy place, there is no need to discuss about what can be left outside...
translation.Gioia_dog008: It's still my birthday, I have to find the time to celebrate with my relatives.
translation.Mario_dog006: How is it even possible that your family is a concern? You hardly ever mention them! You never introduced me to them! Do they even know I exist? Have you ever told them we have something going on here? Can't they join the celebrations here?
translation.Gioia_dog009: Oh, come on, don't be silly! We already discussed about this. What I do with my private life is not their business. I want them to stay out of this. They wouldn't understand.
translation.Mario_dog007: You are ashamed of this relationship, aren't you?
translation.Gioia_dog010: Don't. Just don't. Not again. I had enough, I have things to take care of. I'll be back later.
translation.Mario_dog011: [i]And I need to solve this before the party or she'll blame it on me.[/i]
translation.Mario_dog012: [i]I know what will change her mood...[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_mariohouse: [i]I am not escaping this by getting back here! And probably someone else took this place already.[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_gioiahouse: [i]I hope she won't decide to get back here...[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_park: [i]Sure. Should I pick some flowers? Lame...[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_townhall: [i]I could hang a banner from the rooftop. "Forgive me". Pathetic. And then I'd get arrested. I don't have the privileges to get here.[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_restaurant: [i]This reminds me I haven't been eating anything for lunch.[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_bar: [i]And then what? Buy an "all you can drink" voucher she'd never use?[/i]
translation.Mario_dog_dogpound: [i]I guess this is the right day. Someone is going to find a new home! Let's go.[/i]
translation.Mario_dog013: Hello buddy! Who is a good boy? Who is going to make someone happy for her birthday?
translation.Gioia_dog011: Hey, I had to go back home because forgot something. I decided to text you, so I could save you some time.
translation.Gioia_dog012: Never mind about the invitations. Maybe it is not a good idea to throw a party.
translation.Gioia_dog013: Don't wait for me. I don't know when I'll be back.
translation.Mario_dog014a: Wait, what are you saying, we've been waiting for this moment forever! Our first party at our new place!
translation.Mario_dog014b: Come on, don't be silly, I was just overreacting, I'd just want you not to be ashamed of us and introduce me to your parents for once! I am sorry!
translation.Mario_dog014c: I just sent the invitation to everybody, we can't just cancel the party!
translation.Gioia_dog014: I am sorry. This is just not working. I wanted so badly to make things work. I am feeling trapped in this relationship. I need something more. You just can't satisfy my needs. Everything seems so perfect and yet so fake.
translation.Mario_dog015: Honey, what are you saying? You know I do everything I can for you! I am always around, I am always there for you. Who else has ever stayed so close to you?
translation.Gioia_dog015: This is not the problem! I need a real man, someone that can give me real sensations, someone able to literally take my breath away!
translation.Mario_dog016: I thought I was the one making you feel this way...
translation.Gioia_dog016: You were. You used to give me shivers. You used to make me laugh until I cried. You were the one whispering in my ears until I fell asleep. And god how I loved it.
translation.Gioia_dog017: But things cannot stay like this forever.
translation.Mario_dog018: You know I cannot do more than this. We discussed this already. I thought you were OK with this.
translation.Gioia_dog018: I thought as well. I was in a difficult period when we met. I thought it was enough. I thought it would help me moving on. It was amazing.
translation.Gioia_dog019: People just change. We wanted our love to be beautiful, not realistic.
translation.Gioia_dog020: I need a real life. And this is not real to me. Not anymore.
translation.Mario_dog021a: It is real. My love for you is real. What we have here is real. Don't do this to me.
translation.Mario_dog021b: Reality as well is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one. You will regret giving up the dream.
translation.Mario_dog021c: One person's craziness is another person's reality. And we were happy to be crazy together.
translation.Mario_dog021d: The real world is where the monsters are. I can keep you safe.
translation.Mario_dog021e: Reality is frequently inaccurate. And overrated.
translation.Mario_dog021f: Reality exists in the human mind, and nowhere else. We create our own reality.
translation.Mario_dog22: I'll be waiting for you at your party. We'll all be waiting for you. There will be all of our friends!
translation.Gioia_dog021: Don't wait for me tonight. I'll stay at my parents'.
translation.Mario_dog23: We'll fix everything tomorrow... I got you a present...
translation.Mario_bday_002: Sure, you can leave that over there...
translation.Mario_bday_003: Yeah, I'll be there in a sec...
translation.Mario_bday_004: Oh, hi! Good to see you here!
translation.Mario_bday_005: Yeah, she should be here any minute...
translation.Mario_bday_006: [i]Come on, don't do this to me...[/i]
translation.Mario_bday_007: Hey guys, I've organized a multiple choice quiz for the afternoon, don't forget to book your place if you want to participate!
translation.Mario_bday_008: [i]Come on, this was supposed to be our dream party...[/i]
translation.npc_bday_003: Hello! Good to see you! We almost thought you wouldn't come!
translation.Gioia_bday_001: Hey guys! You're so many! Thanks for coming!
translation.Mario_bday_009: Hey, you came... I am so glad you did... I was so worried...
translation.Gioia_bday_002: Hey... thanks for this party. The garden is amazing.
translation.Mario_bday_010: I am sorry about yesterday, I really am. Are you still mad at me?
translation.Gioia_bday_003: It's OK. I'll just- hey! Why hello! What is this?
translation.Mario_bday_011: Oh, well, that's your present... I know you wanted a dog, but well... This one weighs less, performs better...
translation.npc_bday_004: So! How many this year? You're getting old, aren't you?
translation.npc_bday_005: Hey, that's not getting older, it is leveling up!
translation.Gioia_bday_005: Soooo funny of you guys... Thanks, thank you all for joining me here. It means a lot to me.
translation.Gioia_bday_006: Especially today, especially in this moment.
translation.Gioia_bday_007: I never thought I would have taken this decision, but I made up my mind.
translation.Gioia_bday_008: And that is why it is so important you are all here now. I was not sure I wanted to attend this party but it is a great occasion to say what I need to say.
translation.Gioia_bday_009: You've all been part of my life in these last three years or so. You got to know me, and I got to know you.
translation.Gioia_bday_010: You welcomed me when I was having a tough time, you made me laugh, you made me grow.
translation.Gioia_bday_011: And that is why I wish to thank you all. It costs me a lot, but I need to spread my wings, now. This life no longer belongs to me.
translation.Gioia_bday_012: I am sure well'have our chance to meet somewhere else. Many of you know where to find me. I'll be happy to see you, really.
translation.Gioia_bday_013: Maybe I'll pass by from time to time to bring back good memories and see if you're still around...
translation.Gioia_bday_014: But for now, I am saying goodbye. I hope you'll understand and respect my decision.
translation.Gioia_bday_015: You also know I hate long goodbyes, which is why I'll cut short and I'll go now, I am not changing my mind. Take care you all, I'll always keep a great memory of this place and my time spent with you.
translation.Mario_bday_012: Wait- what?! Mael, wait! What are y-
translation.Gioia_bday_016: Thank you so much guys. See you around, don't be a stranger!
translation.Mario_bday_013: Mael, please don't! Stay! Don't go!

translation.System_001: Ti diamo il benvenuto a Borgo Reale! È un piacere averti qui!
translation.System_002: Premi spazio per interagire, leggere e parlare.
translation.System_003: Premi i tasti freccia per camminare.
translation.System_004: Prenditi il tuo tempo per esplorare i dintorni, fare una passeggiata e goderti la città!
translation.System_005: Potresti trovare qualche attività interessante da fare e conoscere nuove persone!
translation.Mario_001: [i]Non sembra male qui. Vediamo un po' cosa c'è in giro.[/i]
translation.Town_hall_party:
